REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0378 reute u f BC-LIFETIME-<LFT>-TO-MAK 03-03 0055

TEXT.TITLE: LIFETIME <LFT> TO MAKE ANNOUNCEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Lifetime Corp said it will make an announcement this morning between 1000 EST and 1030 EST. A company spokesman said the company preferred not to comment until that time. The American Stock Exchange delayed trading in Lifetime shares this morning for news pending. Reuter
